meanings.sent1: The waygoing train left the station.
meanings.sent2: She waved goodbye to her waygoing friend.
meanings.sent3: The waygoing squirrel hurriedly packed its acorns before winter.
meanings.sent4: The waygoing sun slowly disappeared behind the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The waygoing ship sailed off into the distance, leaving a trail of waves behind.

meanings.definition: The act of leaving or departing
meanings.sent1: His waygoing was sudden and unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The waygoing of the birds signaled the change of season.
meanings.sent3: The waygoing of the students at the end of the school year was filled with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The waygoing of the old year and the arrival of the new brought hope for the future.
meanings.sent5: The waygoing of the river into the vast ocean symbolized the journey of life.
